alert.note: Alert for Haskell; Latimer; Le Flore; Muskogee; Sequoyah (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 27 at 12:01AM CST by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Haskell, central Sequoyah, northern Latimer, central Le Flore and southeastern Muskogee Counties through 1230 AM CST... At 1201 AM CST, Doppler radar indicated strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 2 miles east of Warner to Wilburton. Movement was east at 60 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations in or near the path include... Sallisaw... Poteau... Wilburton... Stigler... Muldrow... Heavener... Spiro... Warner... Vian... Panama... Wister... Howe... Porum... Webbers Falls... Keota... Red Oak... Mccurtain... Bokoshe... Fanshawe... Whitefield... This includes Interstate 40 in Oklahoma between mile markers 277 and 321. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 100 AM CST for southeastern and east central Oklahoma.

area.areaDesc: Haskell; Latimer; Le Flore; Muskogee; Sequoyah
